params.amount: Amount to collect (must be <= platform balance)

emergencyWithdraw().details: For emergency use only - withdraws contract balance to owner

params.limit: Maximum number of tips to return
Maximum number of tips to return (0 = all)
Maximum number of tips to return (0 = all)
Maximum number of tips to return (0 = all)
Maximum number of creators to return

returns._0: Array of LeaderboardEntry structs sorted by totalTipsReceived

params.limit: Maximum number of tippers to return

returns._0: Array of LeaderboardEntry structs sorted by totalTipsSent
Total user count from profile registry

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.message: Optional message (max length handled by validation)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateFee(uint256).notice: Calculate platform fee for a given amount

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraw (only owner, only when paused)

getActiveCreators().notice: Get number of active creators (users with tips received > 0)

getTipHistory(address,uint256).notice: Get tip history for a user (sent or received)

getTipsReceived(string,uint256).notice: Get tips received by a username

getTipsSent(address,uint256).notice: Get tips sent by a specific address

getTopCreators(uint256).notice: Get top creators by tips received

getTopTippers(uint256).notice: Get top tippers by tips sent

getTotalUsers().notice: Get total number of registered users

getTotalVolume().notice: Get total platform volume (sum of all tips)

getUserRank(string).notice: Get user's rank on creator leaderboard

getWithdrawableBalance(address).notice: Get withdrawable balance for an address

sendTip(string,string).notice: Send a tip to a creator by username
